name: Verne Dreaming

reviews.text: Possibly the coolest, quirkiest B+B I've ever stayed in . My room even had a train set - nice touch. Loved it. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: The Best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is not a normal BB. The rooms were originally intented to be a photo studio setup. There are a couple of rooms, with each its own style. Asian, Fusion and not sure whether it is ready, the Californian room.
reviews.title: Romantic location - if you need the a lovely night

description: Our B & B is situated in the heart of the magnificent city of Ghent. Our accomodation offers you 2 spacious and extra-ordinary rooms : Shanghai and Oxford. Both rooms are fully equiped with: flat screen television, dvd player, hifi, extra long bed, private bathroom with bath and shower. A delicious breakfast is included in the price.
